device.title: Devices
device.description: You can connect up to five devices to your Kysk account. Start watching on one device and continue on another.

Your account will be removed from this device. You will need to log in again
for access to recommendations, watch history
and subscription management

trailer.title: Deadpool
trailer.description:
Wade Wilson gets involved with the ime Variance Authority, forcing him
to return as his alter ego Deadpool and rewrite history
with Wolverine.

ad.title: Wednesday
ad.description:
Wednesday, daughter of Gomez and Morticia Addams, studies at Nevermore Academy.
She must master her extrasensory abilities to stop a local
serial killer and uncover her parents' mystery.

quotes.statham: Plays by his own rules — and always looks a million bucks.
quotes.garfield: Always in the spotlight and spreads smiles.
quotes.cage: Doesn't fear taking risks and amazes everyone.

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: This User Agreement (hereinafter - "Agreement") governs the relationship between Kysk LLC (hereinafter - "Service", "We", "Us") and the user (hereinafter - "User", "You") regarding the use of the KyskFilms information resource. By using our service, you automatically agree to the terms of this Agreement.

section2.title: 2. Registration and Account
section2.content: To access the full functionality of the service, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information during registration. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all actions taken under your account.

section3.title: 3. Use of the Service
section3.content: The service is provided "as is" for personal, non-commercial use. It is prohibited to use the service for illegal purposes, copyright infringement, or any activity that may harm the service or other users.

section4.title: 4. Subscriptions and Payment
section4.content: Some services may require payment. Subscription and payment terms are described separately. We reserve the right to change prices and subscription terms with prior notice to users.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content available on the platform, including movies, series, images, logos, and other materials, is the property of their respective owners and protected by copyright laws. Any unauthorized use is prohibited.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the Agreement
section6.content: We reserve the right to make changes to this Agreement. We will notify users of significant changes through our service or email. By continuing to use the service after changes, you agree to the new terms.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We collect information that you provide to us directly (name, email, phone number), as well as technical information about your device and service usage (IP address, browser type, viewed movies) to improve service quality.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.content: The collected information is used to provide and improve services, personalize viewing experience, process payments, communicate with users, and ensure service security.

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.content: We take technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is absolutely secure.

section4.title: 4. Disclosure to Third Parties
section4.content: We do not sell or transfer your personal data to third parties, except when necessary to provide services, comply with legal requirements, or with your consent.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section5.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to save your settings, analyze service usage, and personalize content. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, but this may affect service functionality.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us through the contact information provided on the website.

rulesPage.title: Rules for Application of Recommendation Technologies

section1.title: 1. General Provisions
section1.content: The KyskFilms information resource applies recommendation technologies in accordance with the Rules approved by the legislation of Ukraine. These technologies are designed to personalize content and improve user experience.

section2.title: 2. Principles of Recommendation Systems
section2.content: Recommendation technologies analyze your viewing history, preferences, ratings, and other behavioral data to generate personalized recommendations. The system takes into account genres, actors, directors, and other characteristics of the content you watch.

section3.title: 3. Data Usage
section3.content: For the operation of recommendation systems, we use anonymized data about your activity on the platform: viewed movies and series, added to favorites, ratings, and other interactions with content. This data is processed automatically and is not transferred to third parties.

section4.title: 4. Algorithm Transparency
section4.content: We strive to ensure transparency in the operation of recommendation systems. Users have the opportunity to see why certain movies or series are recommended to them and influence the formation of recommendations through their actions on the platform.

section5.title: 5. User Control
section5.content: You can influence recommendations by adding content to favorites, giving ratings, and viewing diverse content. You also have the option to clear viewing history or reset recommendation settings in the profile settings section.

section6.title: 6. Responsibility
section6.content: Recommendations are generated automatically based on algorithms and are not a guarantee that the content will meet your expectations. We are not responsible for the content of recommended material, but we constantly work to improve the accuracy of recommendations.

supermanAd.description: Superman must reconcile his alien Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as reporter Clark Kent. As the embodiment of truth, justice and the human way, he soon finds himself in a world that considers them old-fashioned.

filmsPage.description: Online cinema KYSK has collected a collection of thousands of films of various genres and directions for its subscribers.
